title: What are the advantages and disadvantages of globalization in science? - Quora

response.answer_text: Science used to have no national boundary. The advantage is that everybody can join in for the advance of science. Nowadays, too much has been given to national interest, even to the extend of science, particularly, in scientific inventions. Global sharing of science are somehow restricted.
The advantage is that people all over the world will benefit from the new information. The disadvantage is that some nations will steal military design and technology whenever possible.
